prop.name: activeDocumentMode
prop.description: editor client is set to edit a document of this type

prop.name: attributeDateFormat
prop.description: Date format used in AkomaNtoso Attributes

prop.name: documentActionsFolderRoot
prop.description: Where all document actions are defined

prop.name: iconPath
prop.description: path to icons used by editor

prop.name: localRegistryFolder
prop.description: path to local registry (sub folder under main installation)

prop.name: locale.Country.iso3166-1-a2
prop.description: This is the country code used for loading message bundles; you can use resource bundles from a different country than what is the active country of the Editor

prop.name: locale.Language.iso639-1
prop.description: Default language code used for java locales

prop.name: locale.Language.iso639-2
prop.description: Default iso language mode for editor

prop.name: ontologiesFile
prop.description: default path for the different kind of questions

prop.name: panelsFolderRoot
prop.description: default path to find panel configurations

prop.name: parliament.CountryCode
prop.description: This is the 'active' country code used by the editor for all markup info ; this country must exist in the COUNTRY_CODES table; Note that this setting does not affect the locale

prop.name: parliament.DefaultPart
prop.description: This is the default part set in the part selector for metadata; this part must exist in DOCUMENT_PARTS

prop.name: registryJDBCdriver
prop.description: jdbc driver to use for registry

prop.name: registryJDBCdriverPrefix
prop.description: prefix for registry jdbc connection string

prop.name: registryPassword
prop.description: password to connect to registry db

prop.name: registryUser
prop.description: user name to connect to registry db

prop.name: root:judgement
prop.description: name of root section for judgement

prop.name: sectionTypesFolderRoot
prop.description: default location showing the various section types for doc types

prop.name: textMetadataPropertyBeginMarker
prop.description: used to demarcate beginning of inline metadata

prop.name: textMetadataPropertyEndMarker
prop.description: used to demarcate ending of inline metadata

prop.name: toolbarActionsFolderRoot
prop.description: default path for the actions for display in toolbar
